backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 139, 141, and 143 Portland Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1754-2019 to designate 139, 141, and 143 Portland Street (Spadina-Fort York, Ward 10) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 1754-2019 - To designate the property at 139, 141 and 143 Portland Street as being of cultural value or interest.
